author: newflyer
title: Fabulous Place
text:
My trip to South Africa was booked thru a travel company so I did not pick this place, but I am very glad they did. It was laid out very nicely and the grounds are kept very neat. They give you a map of the property so you can see what there is and where it is. I received a complimentary glass of wine upon check in. My room was located on the 2nd floor and was very quiet. It was pretty large and had a working fireplace, I did not use it while there, a ceiling fan which I did use. I ate both the complimentary breakfast they provided one morning and enjoyed the to go breakfast they provided the day I had to leave before the breakfast was served. I also ate dinner on the property and it was great (I had steak). I went for a quick dip in the small plunge pool located behind my room, it was freezing cold, but very close to my room. I did not purchase anything from the gift shop but they had nice things for sale.
